chat.title: AI Assistant
chat.welcome_message: Hello! I'm your AI assistant for the Duvenbeck workshop data. I can help you find information about ideas, priorities, and insights from all departments. What would you like to know?
chat.input_placeholder: Ask me about the workshop data...

problems.intensive_research: Time-intensive research for analysis of historical revenue, years/months/quarters, prices, contract situations etc.
problems.fp_analysis: Productivity of own fleet Tour ID

solutions.fp_analysis: Automated creation of Tour-ID to identify when 2 or more Car_O tours are combined into a round trip. Use Fleetboard for automatic route and productivity analysis. Comprehensive analysis of relevant fleet performance KPIs

complexity.presentation_creation: Multiple data sources (e.g., IDL, Lukanet, CAR_O), different presentation levels (BUKRS <> PC), variance analysis of key KPIs, summary of topics based on predefined PPT structure, at Company-Level, BU-Level and Group-Level
complexity.intensive_research: Multiple data sources, complex initial setup, linking of different data
complexity.fp_analysis: Productivity analysis regarding various KPIs, different transfer prices complicate matters, planning bases and assumptions not identical, round trip detection desired, early detection of deviations through partial live evaluation

roi.presentation_creation: CO support, time savings in Controlling
roi.intensive_research: CO support, time savings across many involved departments
roi.fp_analysis: Fleet optimization, cost reduction, revenue increase, prevention of empty runs and detours

risk.presentation_creation: Sensitive data, comprehensive financial values from all areas
risk.intensive_research: Sensitive data, comprehensive financial values from all areas, additionally from operational areas
risk.fp_analysis: No highly sensitive data in application

strategic.presentation_creation: Support for communication with different shareholders

problems.target_prices: Target prices make up 50% of inquiries, often without profit

solutions.requirements_specification: Automatic information about the most important points with 'filtering' by department, project area
solutions.target_prices: Automatic creation of target prices as indications
solutions.contract_review: Automatic detection of major deviations from DUV standard

complexity.requirements_specification: Experience: Weighting of information essential, languages; wording, accuracy of information but on the other hand pure information processing
complexity.target_prices: Input of standard information/basic data analogous to CCT

cost.requirements_specification: Low effort/usage, programming effort however given
cost.target_prices: Higher usage, simple data processing/technical implementation
cost.contract_review: Low effort/usage, programming effort however given

roi.requirements_specification: Small group of people who come in contact with it, only data summarization, time savings for initial document review
roi.target_prices: Reduction of calculation effort, freeing up resources for projects
roi.contract_review: Small group of people who come in contact with it, interpretation help, time savings for decision makers

risk.contract_review: Misinterpretation can lead to high follow-up costs, data security with confidential customer information?

strategic.requirements_specification: Qualitative decision support, time savings for employees
strategic.target_prices: No resource binding, concentration on important/strategic projects

ideas.market_analysis_automation: Part A External: Market Analysis Automation
ideas.strategic_scenario_planning: Strategic Scenario Planning // Corporate Strategy Evaluation and Master Plan of Action Generation
ideas.competition_trend_alerts: Part A External: Competition Monitoring & Trend Alerts
ideas.dashboard_reporting: Dashboard/Reporting Creation for Target Achievement (KAM Plans, Budget Targets, Operational Performance)
ideas.product_portfolio_extension: Target: Product Portfolio Extension: - Analysis of potential product extensions based on existing customers - What business models/products/services need to be built additionally? + Make or Buy Analysis

problems.market_analysis_automation: Market and competitive analyses are time-consuming and often not up to date.
problems.strategic_scenario_planning: Strategic decisions are often based on incomplete or outdated assumptions.
problems.customer_profitability_analysis: Decisions about investments or divestments are complex and require many data points.
problems.competition_trend_alerts: New competitors, technologies, or business models are often recognized too late.
problems.dashboard_reporting: High effort, no standards, little homogeneous definition in the group
problems.contract_database: Renegotiations, deviations TARGET vs ACTUAL in contract
problems.product_portfolio_extension: High effort to identify individual service extensions for customers

solutions.market_analysis_automation: AI-powered tools aggregate data in real-time and automatically create concise market overviews.
solutions.strategic_scenario_planning: AI-supported scenario simulations model different strategies and their potential impacts.
solutions.customer_profitability_analysis: AI evaluates existing projects and investments based on KPIs, risk, and growth potential, and provides recommendations.
solutions.competition_trend_alerts: AI continuously monitors market trends and competitor activities and creates alerts for relevant changes.
solutions.dashboard_reporting: Brainstorming and development of standardized templates for all dashboards (Excel + PPT Export)
solutions.contract_database: Scan of SLAs/contracts and comparison with ACTUAL values in the system
solutions.product_portfolio_extension: Once database with all customer contracts is available, it's easy to do a gap analysis and check where upscaling is possible or not + Business Solution can be sketched by AI and potential white spots identified.

complexity.market_analysis_automation: Not complex; however, some data is only available in download documents or behind paywalls. Regular updates/extensions of parameters may be necessary
complexity.strategic_scenario_planning: No complexity. Through stating objectives, possible alternatives can be quickly brainstormed and scenarios evaluated faster
complexity.customer_profitability_analysis: Many data points needed from various tools (SAP, customer portal, local and central) as well as documented problems and processes to define optimization potential. Financial metrics available but other topics mostly not centrally stored = Many knowledge holders
complexity.competition_trend_alerts: Not complex; however, some data is only available in download documents or behind paywalls. Regular updates/extensions of parameters may be necessary
complexity.dashboard_reporting: Many data needed from various tools (SAP, customer portal etc)
complexity.contract_database: Very high complexity because many TARGET data like volume are only shared sporadically by customers, or only available retrospectively = Simultaneously many documents and contracts not digitized = Basically every contract and all SLAs (which change regularly) would always need to be updated
complexity.product_portfolio_extension: Once database with all customer contracts is available, it's easy to do a gap analysis and check where upscaling is possible or not + Business Solution can be sketched by AI and potential white spots identified.

cost.market_analysis_automation: Costs may only be necessary for certain tools/websites (e.g., Orbis). Some licenses already available.
cost.customer_profitability_analysis: Low costs, only in-house data + irregular queries (1x per quarter per customer ??)
cost.competition_trend_alerts: Costs may only be necessary for certain tools/websites (e.g., Orbis). Some licenses already available.
cost.dashboard_reporting: Data exports/interfaces etc necessary to generate live real values

roi.market_analysis_automation: ROI not measurable as analysis only represents decision support -> Time savings very high
roi.strategic_scenario_planning: No ROI; Support in decision-making and faster strategy adjustment due to changed conditions = No long-term strategy workshops potentially necessary = Cost savings + Faster top-down implementation of goals and measures per resort and partially department + Savings in consulting costs
roi.customer_profitability_analysis: Low ROI; Helps with quick analysis
roi.competition_trend_alerts: ROI not measurable as analysis only represents decision support -> Time savings very high
roi.dashboard_reporting: Many FTEs throughout the group busy with reporting tasks + updates. Through automation, especially in controlling, various times can be used more efficiently
roi.contract_database: Deviations and potential for renegotiations quickly and potentially proactively identifiable by AI. = Currently only checked if delivered according to contract in case of negative events or P&L result. Bonus-malus agreements are partially checked by customers and transmitted to DUV = Review and correction can be replaced by AI thus freeing resources for other topics
roi.product_portfolio_extension: Quick analysis and KAM plans can be created

risk.strategic_scenario_planning: Incorrect questions/info lead to wrong plans and mismatched goals
risk.customer_profitability_analysis: High risk if assumptions are incorrect and customer conversations are interpreted negatively
risk.dashboard_reporting: No risk; Internal data. At most misinterpretation or wrong definitions

strategic.market_analysis_automation: Data helps in analyzing possible strategic directions and in decision-making/review with shareholders = Data driven
strategic.strategic_scenario_planning: 3-5 different strategy reviews were done in 3 years = Helps with regular updates and readjustments = Securing information from knowledge holders (C-Level fluctuation)
strategic.customer_profitability_analysis: Necessary; Wanted by CEO and helps achieve goals (EBITDA) as objective decisions can be made about expansion or exit of customer relationships
strategic.competition_trend_alerts: Data helps in analyzing possible strategic directions and in decision-making/review with shareholders = Data driven
strategic.dashboard_reporting: To make agile and fast-paced decisions, ZDF is needed at the push of a button = At the same time high reporting effort towards shareholders can be reduced and standardized = M&A necessity = Data and reporting structures necessary for possible shareholder exit
strategic.product_portfolio_extension: Growth, cross-selling and customer development desired and required. Entry barriers with current customer base lower than new acquisition

market_analysis_automation.problemStatement: Currently, market analyses require significant manual effort, with teams spending 15-20 hours per week gathering data from various sources. Information becomes outdated quickly, and competitive intelligence is often fragmented. This leads to delayed strategic decisions and missed opportunities in fast-moving markets.
market_analysis_automation.proposedSolution: Implementation of an AI-driven platform that automatically aggregates real-time market data from multiple sources including industry reports, news feeds, financial databases, and social media. The system will generate automated reports, competitive benchmarking, and trend analysis with customizable dashboards for different stakeholder groups.
market_analysis_automation.businessCase: Time savings of 80% in market research activities (equivalent to 12-16 hours per week), improved data accuracy and timeliness, better competitive positioning through early trend identification, estimated annual savings of €150,000 in research costs plus opportunity value of faster market response.
market_analysis_automation.timeline: Phase 1 (Months 1-3): Platform selection and data source integration. Phase 2 (Months 4-6): AI model training and dashboard development. Phase 3 (Months 7-9): Testing, refinement, and user training. Full implementation by Month 9.
market_analysis_automation.resources: Budget: €200,000. Team: 1 Data Scientist, 1 Business Analyst, 0.5 FTE IT Support. External consulting for initial setup and training.
market_analysis_automation.riskAssessment: Low-Medium risk. Main risks include data quality issues, integration challenges with existing systems, and user adoption. Mitigation strategies include phased rollout, comprehensive training, and fallback to manual processes during transition.
market_analysis_automation.successMetrics: Reduction in research time by 80%, increase in market report frequency by 300%, improvement in competitive intelligence accuracy by 50%, user satisfaction score >4.0/5.0, ROI achievement within 18 months.

dashboard_reporting.problemStatement: Current reporting processes are highly fragmented across the organization, with each department using different tools, formats, and definitions. This creates inconsistencies, requires significant manual effort (estimated 25+ FTE hours weekly across all departments), and makes cross-departmental analysis difficult. Stakeholders receive delayed and often incomparable information.
dashboard_reporting.proposedSolution: Development of a centralized, automated dashboard system with standardized KPI definitions, real-time data integration from SAP and other core systems, and customizable views for different user groups. The system will include automated report generation, drill-down capabilities, and mobile access for executives.
dashboard_reporting.businessCase: Reduction in reporting effort by 70% (saving approximately 17 FTE hours weekly), improved data consistency and accuracy, faster decision-making through real-time insights, estimated annual savings of €400,000 in operational costs, plus improved strategic agility and stakeholder satisfaction.
dashboard_reporting.timeline: Phase 1 (Months 1-2): Requirements gathering and system design. Phase 2 (Months 3-5): Core platform development and data integration. Phase 3 (Months 6-8): Dashboard creation and testing. Phase 4 (Months 9-10): Training and rollout. Full deployment by Month 10.
dashboard_reporting.resources: Budget: €350,000. Team: 1 Business Intelligence Developer, 1 Data Analyst, 1 UX Designer, 0.5 FTE each from IT and Controlling departments. External vendor for platform licensing and initial configuration.
dashboard_reporting.riskAssessment: Medium risk. Key risks include data quality issues, resistance to standardization, integration complexity, and change management challenges. Mitigation includes stakeholder engagement, phased rollout, comprehensive training program, and dedicated change management support.
dashboard_reporting.successMetrics: 70% reduction in manual reporting time, 100% standardization of KPI definitions across departments, real-time data refresh (vs. current weekly/monthly cycles), user adoption rate >85%, accuracy improvement >95%, executive satisfaction score >4.5/5.0.

contract_database.requiredResources: Digitization and harmonization of SLA + contract data if not available in the system. Budget: None
contract_database.dataAvailability: Contracts are available in legal systems and CRM = Completeness verification necessary
contract_database.genaiConsiderations: Prototype milestones: Necessary, Pilot design: Necessary if tool is to be made available to sites, Ethics and data protection: Not applicable = Work only with internal data, Scalability: N/A, Change management: N/A

problems.contract_insurance_review: Contract review - Liability & Insurance including checklist
problems.document_administration: Documentation/Administration and summarization of email threads, documents, contract reviews in file system with creation of content description in file storage system
problems.legal_document_creation: Creation of legal briefs, lawsuits, responses to lawsuits, letters etc.
problems.contract_analysis: Review and analysis of standards (NDA, CoC, IT-GTC, DPA etc.) as well as non-standardized contracts
problems.meeting_summarization: Negotiation summarization / Meeting summarization / Conversation summarization

solutions.damage_claim_review: Is the damage reimbursable? Liability requirements met? Assessment of damage extent
solutions.contract_insurance_review: Creation of checklist including marking relevant passages, preliminary review if necessary, translation
solutions.document_administration: Automated assignment of documents to relevant files and content extraction with summary creation (automated case documentation)
solutions.legal_document_creation: Use of research results, case summaries etc. for creation of texts in legal tone using predefined templates including from beck-online database
solutions.contract_analysis: Automatic review and summarization including consideration of predefined rules (OTRIS AI solution)
solutions.recurring_case_chatbot: Chatbot for routine legal questions and guidance

complexity.damage_claim_review: Contract review, legal liability, market values, scrap values, type of goods and function
complexity.contract_insurance_review: Data for checklist can be easily extracted. Only insurance topics relevant, not the entire contract. Provision of insurance coverage possible
complexity.document_administration: Low complexity because: pure reading of existing data; partly systems known that can already implement this
complexity.legal_document_creation: Contract creation: more complex; Creation of legal briefs and processing descriptions: less complex
complexity.contract_analysis: Medium to high: Depends on rule variety and document structure. AI must understand both legal language and specific company rules
complexity.recurring_case_chatbot: Medium: Building internal knowledge pool, training AI on company-specific content and ongoing maintenance necessary
complexity.meeting_summarization: Less complex: Speech recognition, topic analysis and summarization are technically well manageable. Additional requirements for legally secure storage and possibly multilingualism
complexity.risk_analysis_automation: Relatively complex: Playbooks must be created in advance; development of results and evaluations

cost.damage_claim_review: Separate program required (contains confidential company data). Employee effort relatively low (reduction in workload). Cost savings in insurance & expert costs
cost.contract_insurance_review: Separate program required (contains confidential company data). Employee effort relatively low (reduction in workload)
cost.legal_document_creation: Medium to high investment costs; ongoing costs dependent on usage and API queries
cost.contract_analysis: Costs through OTRIS (add-on to OTRIS) relatively low, as system already exists and it's just an add-on
cost.recurring_case_chatbot: One-time implementation and continuous maintenance by Legal (DUV GPT could be used after implementation)
cost.meeting_summarization: Medium: Dependent on solution (e.g. internal AI, MS Copilot, third-party). Ongoing costs low when using existing systems
cost.risk_analysis_automation: Medium: Initial effort for system integration and parameterization, then low ongoing costs

roi.contract_insurance_review: Faster feedback to customers = improved customer satisfaction. Savings in employee effort
roi.document_administration: Very high through time savings in document filing, research and case processing
roi.legal_document_creation: Very high: significant time savings for recurring tasks (drafts, statements, internal feedback). Reduces research and formulation effort
roi.contract_analysis: High time savings once implemented; Creation of playbook requires increased time investment upfront
roi.recurring_case_chatbot: Relatively high: Relieves team from routine inquiries, reduces processing times, increases response speed
roi.meeting_summarization: Relatively high: Saves considerable time in post-processing and improves documentation quality. Reduces risk of losing important points
roi.risk_analysis_automation: High: Significant time savings in risk analyses and DPIA preparation, improved traceability and lower error susceptibility

risk.damage_claim_review: Must be double-checked by employee. Negotiations still possible. Sometimes contains sensitive company data
risk.contract_insurance_review: Must be double-checked by employee to avoid coverage gaps
risk.document_administration: Medium risk, as only existing content is read and no new results are generated
risk.legal_document_creation: Medium: Risks concern content accuracy, data confidentiality in external processing and copyright. Well manageable through clear governance and manual final control
risk.contract_analysis: Low to medium: Low risk with internal use; external cloud solution requires data protection and security review. Risk of incorrect assessments with incomplete rules
risk.recurring_case_chatbot: Higher risk: Accuracy of keywords error-prone
risk.meeting_summarization: Medium risk with data protection compliant use controllable
risk.risk_analysis_automation: Human control remains necessary, result quality depends on data basis and parameters, data protection compliance of AI used must be ensured

strategic.damage_claim_review: Savings in external and internal personnel expenses
strategic.contract_insurance_review: Faster customer responses = improved customer satisfaction. Savings in employee effort
strategic.contract_analysis: Very good fit: Strengthens quality assurance, standardization and traceability. Supports digital transformation of legal department
strategic.recurring_case_chatbot: Direct response, quick initial assessment, process acceleration
strategic.meeting_summarization: Standardization of documentation, increased digitalization and quality
strategic.risk_analysis_automation: Direct support of accountability obligation according to Art. 5 Para. 2 GDPR

damage_claim_review.dataAvailability: Damage documentation (images, damage reports, proof of value, etc.) / legal foundations + expertise
damage_claim_review.genaiConsiderations: Access to existing damage software to create a corresponding expert opinion.

legal_document_creation.potentialConflicts: Other specialized departments as users of templates
legal_document_creation.dataAvailability: Desired structure and content must be specified, templates must be provided, case summaries must be provided
legal_document_creation.genaiConsiderations: LLM tool required, correct use/formulation of prompts and selection of appropriate prompts

recurring_case_chatbot.dataAvailability: Provision of information and answers in the form of playbooks; Documents and information from specialized departments required for evaluation and answering questions
recurring_case_chatbot.genaiConsiderations: Question-answer model based on simple if-then specifications

problems.cash_forecast: Cash forecast is time-consuming due to various data sources
problems.chatbot_external: Creditor payment reminders and invoice inquiries require too much manual time
problems.ic_differences: Occurrence and subsequent clarification of IC differences

solutions.document_reading: Reading of transport orders, delivery notes and contracts
solutions.cash_forecast: Automated integration of all available sources and logical evaluation
solutions.chatbot_external: These standard inquiries could be easily answered by a chatbot
solutions.ic_differences: Automated analysis of differences, development of solution proposals

complexity.document_reading:
Document type must be recognized
Relevant information must be read depending on document type
For contracts: checking against specified parameters
For invoices: pre-recording/booking
For leasing permanent invoices: information storage in SAP
For transport documents: information storage in Car_O
complexity.cash_forecast:
Read CO budget, categorize, assign
Customer/entrepreneur assignment
Customer payment behavior
Factoring forecast depending on billing status/speed
complexity.chatbot_external:
Categorization into customers/entrepreneurs
clear information query (reference/transport order/credit note number)
clear response with payment date or document copy (payment run)
complexity.ic_differences: Evaluation of Excel tables exported from LucaNet (comparison of actual figures)

cost.cash_forecast:
Implementation costs possibly relatively high
ongoing costs rather low due to low query intensity
cost.chatbot_external: Potentially higher costs due to many queries
cost.ic_differences: Monthly evaluation, manageable size of Excel tables

roi.document_reading:
Staff reduction possible in many areas
Time savings
faster liquidity
higher data quality

risk.cash_forecast: High complexity of different data sources
risk.chatbot_external:
False information can be shared
Responses may not match entrepreneur data

problems.nine_am_process: 9 AM process requires many resources (personnel, time)

solutions.nine_am_process: Workflow for retrieving RFQs / RFIs, summarizing and filling fields in CRM via an AI agent (Tool: Dynamics) / Automatic data download
solutions.ftl_precalculation:
- Which loads are a perfect fit?
- Current costs / Provision of cost KPIs from actual figures / Own data
- Automatic capture of transport information from tender documents
- Automated creation of factsheets for companies / NDA extraction
- Correction of incorrect ZIP code entries / Plausibility check
- Automatic scheduling for calculation alignment in Outlook
- Pre-calculation on SharePoint
solutions.subcontractor_database: Structured provision of information / Automated transport requests to subcontractors / Price structure etc.

complexity.nine_am_process: Support from CRM team, agent must write to CRM / Workflow tool needs access to Outlook
complexity.ftl_precalculation: Heavily depends on the design and scope of functionality
complexity.subcontractor_database: Building a new table in the database, creating a new report in the reporting system

cost.nine_am_process: Number of tokens is manageable <1000 Euro per year / Purchase of Workflow Manager 600 Euro
cost.ftl_precalculation: Processing of actual data and cost KPIs must be done independently of AI. Should build on existing or planned reporting system
cost.subcontractor_database: Development costs in data preparation and provision / Ongoing AI costs manageable

roi.nine_am_process: Increased employee productivity, approx. 3 hours per day, but measurable effect on offer volume because more can be processed
roi.ftl_precalculation: Increases calculation reliability and improves probability of contract award
roi.subcontractor_database: Reduction of empty runs, resulting in better equipment utilization

risk.ftl_precalculation: Mostly internal process / But data protection issue

nine_am_process.conflicts: Synergies between 9 am process and precalculation; no (potential) conflicts known
nine_am_process.resources:
Personnel: - one FTE Tender management / Business Analytics
Budget: - < 1,000 € AI agent, ~600 € Workflow platform (per year)
Technologies: - CRM - n8n - Claude (Anthropic) - Outlook
nine_am_process.dataAvailability: No data needs to be provided, historical tenders are available.
nine_am_process.genaiConsiderations:
Prototype milestone: Test in CRM Sandbox
Pilot design: POC in Sandbox by Sales employees
Ethics and data protection: To be clarified whether customer information may be processed
Scalability: n8n possible for other processes, otherwise: Process could be extended to include additional sub-processes
Change Management: Training for workflow management and solution usage, possibly imanSys eLearning
nine_am_process.timeline: MVP by end of October / early November 2025 (depending on authorizations from IT / CRM), POC end of 2025 / early 2026, Implementation Q1 2026
nine_am_process.comments: Very strong synergies with precalculation project, major effect on strategic goals such as bid volume

ftl_precalculation.teams: Tender management, Road Sales, CRM, Legal, IT-BI
ftl_precalculation.conflicts: Synergies between 9 am process and precalculation; no (potential) conflicts known
ftl_precalculation.resources:
Personnel: - one FTE Tender management
Budget: - < 1,000 € AI agent, ~600 € Workflow platform (per year)
Technologies: - CRM (+ SharePoint) - n8n - Claude (Anthropic) - IDL / CarO (Reporting system) - Excel - Outlook
ftl_precalculation.dataAvailability: Transport data in CarO is available, historical NDAs are available
ftl_precalculation.genaiConsiderations:
Prototype milestones: Focus on controlled experiments to validate feasibility.
Pilot design: User-centered tests and iterations based on feedback.
Ethics and data protection: e.g. anonymized data
Scalability: Process could be extended to include additional sub-processes
Change Management: Planning for user training and acceptance.
ftl_precalculation.timeline: tbd, following the 9 am process (approx. 4 - 6 months)
ftl_precalculation.comments: Very strong synergies with precalculation project, major effect on strategic goals such as bid volume

subcontractor_database.teams: Road Sales, IT-BI, Business Analytics, Dispo
subcontractor_database.resources:
Personnel: - IT personnel must be determined by IT, other areas only consulted (not a core task)
Budget: - one-time development costs, estimation by IT-BI; AI costs + Workflow (<2,000 € p.a.)
Technologies: - n8n - Claude (Anthropic) - IDL / CarO (Reporting system) - Excel (+ VBA)
subcontractor_database.dataAvailability: Transport data is available in CarO, Timocom and Transporeon connection
subcontractor_database.genaiConsiderations:
Prototype milestones: Focus on controlled experiments to validate feasibility.
Pilot design: User-centered tests and iterations based on feedback.
Ethics and data protection: Early protective measures (e.g., anonymized data, fairness audits).
Scalability: Evaluation of infrastructure for larger implementations.
Change Management: Planning for user training and acceptance.
subcontractor_database.timeline: Highly dependent on IT-BI schedule, during 2026

ideas.automated_news_procurement: Automated Procurement of News and Potentially Required New Services
ideas.automated_crm_recommendations: Automated Recommendations and Support in CRM System
ideas.ai_contract_review: AI Takes Over Initial Contract Review

problems.automated_news_procurement: Much manual effort and research required to understand the economic situation of a customer and what new service types they might need
problems.automated_crm_recommendations: High manual effort in CRM system through data collection and maintenance
problems.ai_contract_review: KAMs review initial contracts or contract renewals for unacceptable passages and contractual service scope - are we able to fulfill this?

solutions.automated_news_procurement: AI-supported analysis of described points, automated notification about news in any direction
solutions.automated_crm_recommendations: AI provides suggestions in CRM for input fields and supports keeping data current (opportunities etc.). Text fields are filled with suggestions that can be adopted or adjusted (Client Plan)
solutions.ai_contract_review: Use of LLM for reviewing specific contract constellations

complexity.automated_news_procurement: News crawling fundamentally simple. Connection to CRM increases effort. No intervention in critical systems necessary.

cost.automated_crm_recommendations: License costs (per user) can quickly become expensive
cost.ai_contract_review: AI costs low, as it's one document. Legal validation possibly expensive

roi.automated_news_procurement: Cost/benefit not directly derivable. Assumption: Research and preparation effort 1h/per customer. Could be reduced to 15 minutes
roi.ai_contract_review: Depends on customer. If reaction time is long, no time advantage. Lower error rate - overlooking relevant information can reduce follow-up costs

risk.automated_news_procurement: No sensitive customer data required. Main danger lies in misjudgments or "hallucinations" of AI, but controllable through human validation.
risk.automated_crm_recommendations: Microsoft is already used as CRM and Co-Pilot is a component of it. Security measures are therefore based on Microsoft standards, which we would rate as very high.
risk.ai_contract_review: Legal relevance, potential misinterpretations, liability issues. Service catalog, use of sensitive contract data (data protection review)

strategic.automated_crm_recommendations: Transparency - basic sales tool. Sales has the greatest influence on fulfilling the Duvenbeck strategy.

problems.unified_communication: Customer contact information is scattered across different systems.

solutions.ai_data_automation: Automatic summarization of tenders, customer documents, emails and tools in CRM
solutions.automated_quote_creation: Central platform in CRM for automatic calculation of prices, margins and routes
solutions.unified_communication: Integration of all communication channels (email, phone, Teams) into CRM for full transparency and traceability.
solutions.automated_crm_transfer: Automatic entry of B2B data and metrics
solutions.sales_kpi_dashboard: Real-time overview of offers, margins, success rates, customer retention (doesn't necessarily have to be real-time, but regular)

complexity.ai_data_automation: Affects various data formats with different sources
complexity.automated_quote_creation: Matching calculation logic between customer and our calculation
complexity.unified_communication: All requests very individual and there is no single platform where everyone can access (for internal & external) - funnel function
complexity.sales_kpi_dashboard: Depends on data quality; certain basic requirements in CRM or processes must first be adapted
complexity.lead_management_prioritization: If we define scoring model and it is also available in CRM

cost.ai_data_automation: individual consideration of each request and daily frequency
cost.automated_quote_creation: individual consideration of each request and daily frequency
cost.unified_communication: The frequency here is very high for queries
cost.automated_crm_transfer: individual consideration of each request and daily frequency
cost.sales_kpi_dashboard: One-time investment over a certain period possible
cost.lead_management_prioritization: Not many leads are created and we need to create a checklist so that matching can take place

roi.unified_communication: Would reduce effort in terms of time
roi.automated_crm_transfer: Along the process there are many stakeholders who manually enter data into CRM
roi.lead_management_prioritization: We have no internal sales or extremely many field sales employees

risk.ai_data_automation: Internal assessment before it is communicated externally
risk.automated_quote_creation: High risk if wrong analyses are performed
risk.automated_crm_transfer: If the data is incorrectly transferred, it runs through like a red thread and the result is also wrong
risk.lead_management_prioritization: Approach can be made and this creates no disadvantage

problems.document_audit_automation: Preparation for audits and certifications is time-consuming and paper-intensive.
problems.training_management: Mandatory training is difficult to track, and content is often not delivered in a personalized manner.
problems.fake_carrier_detection: Submitted subcontractor documents (e.g., EU license, insurance) are often incorrect, outdated, or forged

solutions.document_audit_automation: AI organizes, updates and verifies documents automatically for completeness and compliance. AI evaluates past internal & external audit deviations, recognizes patterns (e.g., error clustering in processes) and reveals systematic weaknesses. This is then subsequently considered in audit planning (creation of checklist with planning etc.) AI checks whether local documents use the correct template, are content-compliant and complete – including formal & content analysis (upstream document audit)
solutions.training_management: AI systems manage training schedules, automatically remind about deadlines and adapt content to risk profiles. AI creates target-group-specific training (e.g., avatars, videos) automatically based on standard requirements & company-specific content (possibly also from legal requirements)
solutions.fake_carrier_detection: AI checks subcontractor documentation for plausibility, irregularities and formal correctness – actively supporting fake carrier prevention and stopping their deployment (via TMS). Background checks, fraud detection, etc.

complexity.document_audit_automation: Higher complexity due to many document types & standard references
complexity.training_management: Training systems partially implemented in companies, not yet comprehensive. Content must sometimes first be created and standardized. Company structure/hierarchy must be available
complexity.fake_carrier_detection: Technically demanding due to TMS integration & external data reconciliation and various TMS systems in the DUV world

cost.document_audit_automation: Medium to higher costs for AI verification & audit data connection (DMS, Imansys etc.)
cost.training_management: Medium investment for AI-based content & learning paths
cost.fake_carrier_detection: Higher costs for tools, databases, possibly government interfaces

roi.document_audit_automation: Very high benefit: better audit preparation, time savings, systematic risk analysis
roi.training_management: Less effort, better effectiveness, secure evidence chain for audits
roi.fake_carrier_detection: Enormous risk minimization (fraud, fines, reputation damage)

risk.document_audit_automation: Medium risk with analysis errors – but internally well controllable
risk.training_management: Moderate risk, content can be tested and adjusted internally
risk.fake_carrier_detection: Risk of false detection (e.g., legitimate carrier gets blocked), legal safeguarding necessary, damage regulation risk

strategic.document_audit_automation: Actively supports certifications, IMS quality & standardization
strategic.training_management: Directly standard-relevant (e.g., ISO, Legal Compliance), improves professional competence in the company and compliance with legal requirements
strategic.fake_carrier_detection: Highly relevant for Supply Chain Security, TAPA/ISO 28000, customer requirements

problems.media_analysis_industry: The readership of trade media changes permanently, it is difficult to stay on track
problems.kpi_data_monitoring: KPIs are missing, various areas (press releases, competition, internal feedback tool, etc.)
problems.campaign_performance_analysis: The evaluation of marketing campaigns is often done manually and with delay.
problems.brand_training_assistant: Brand Training - missing or unclean corporate design application
problems.image_generation: Greater selection of relevant press images taking into account the new corporate identity, for the press kit with rights at Duvenbeck

solutions.media_analysis_industry: Media database analysis according to specific criteria
solutions.kpi_data_monitoring: Extended functions to Google Alerts, listing from other platforms and overview display of comments, interactions, distribution, tonality
solutions.campaign_performance_analysis: AI analyzes campaign data in real time, recognizes trends and suggests optimizations.
solutions.image_generation: We provide specifications and an image generation tool creates suggestions

complexity.media_analysis_industry: dependent on various external platforms, no single master data source
complexity.kpi_data_monitoring: dependent on various external platforms, no single master data source
complexity.campaign_performance_analysis: Different media are used for campaigns (e.g. MS Dynamics, agencies have different analytic tools, LinkedIn Paid)
complexity.image_generation: probably easy to implement with the right tools

cost.kpi_data_monitoring: Media monitoring: 900€ monthly/11 kEUR p.a., print monitoring possibly extra (providers: Cision, Meltwater)
cost.campaign_performance_analysis: Costs depend on the channel and how often campaigns are run and how large the target group is (fixed costs - if through agency, variable costs - if DUV runs it on media itself)
cost.brand_training_assistant: Style Guide is made available to AI as a data source
cost.image_generation: Marketing images are very expensive due to licensing costs, which depend on media and use in countries as well as frequency (1-time use, multiple use), PR images are cheaper, BUT copyright is a big issue (PR images may not be used as marketing images)

roi.media_analysis_industry: Targeted addressing of relevant trade media to reach target groups - building long-term relationships (trade media approach us for topics, brand distribution becomes easier/becoming a market opinion leader)
roi.kpi_data_monitoring: Outcomes are immediately available and further actions can be adjusted, strategies can be adapted
roi.campaign_performance_analysis: the more precise the campaign, the better you reach the target group and the better the outcome
roi.brand_training_assistant: Low effort, high added value: Simple inquiries are intercepted and do not burden the marketing resource, the organization becomes more independent and has a self-learning effect
roi.image_generation: One-time shooting per year: Long-term sustainability, the images are definitely on brand, licenses (rights) are not an issue

risk.campaign_performance_analysis: Customer data is protected by NDA, the outcome is anonymized, therefore uncritical | internal use
risk.image_generation: the legal side of image generation is viewed as very critical from our information perspective + the quality of generated images

strategic.media_analysis_industry: Building long-term relationships (trade media approach us for topics, brand distribution becomes easier/becoming a market opinion leader)
strategic.campaign_performance_analysis: Better campaign optimization and target group reach
strategic.brand_training_assistant: Conserves resources that can be used for strategic topics + brand identification
strategic.image_generation: Consistent brand identity in visual communication

media_analysis_industry.potentialConflicts: Prioritization of resources between Marketing and AI Team
media_analysis_industry.requiredResources: Personnel (Data Analyst, Project Manager), budget for tools, AI technology (one large analysis repeated at specific intervals)
media_analysis_industry.dataAvailability: Data must be provided by Marketing based on experience: topics, analysis direction, industries, news direction (e.g., company news, product news, personnel announcements, etc.), target group, time period
media_analysis_industry.genaiConsiderations:
Prototype milestones: AI model for data analysis 
Pilot design: User-centered dashboards for Marketing
Ethics & data protection: no sensitive data
Scalability: not necessary, as only for central Marketing team
Change management: Training for Marketing teams
media_analysis_industry.timeline:
Q4 2025: Prototype & data integration
Q1 2026: Pilot phase
Q2 2026: Rollout
media_analysis_industry.additionalComments: Focus on added value: Trend analyses, competitive monitoring, content strategy

kpi_data_monitoring.potentialConflicts: Different KPI definitions between departments, prioritization of resources between Marketing and AI Team
kpi_data_monitoring.requiredResources: Personnel (Data Analyst, Project Manager), budget for tools, AI technology (continuous monitoring)
kpi_data_monitoring.dataAvailability: Press releases, social media data, internal feedback tools, competitive data
kpi_data_monitoring.genaiConsiderations:
Prototype milestones: AI-supported KPI dashboards
Pilot design: Iterative tests with Marketing teams
Ethics & data protection: no sensitive data
Scalability: Integration into existing BI systems
Change management: Training for Marketing teams
kpi_data_monitoring.additionalComments: Goal: Unified KPI overview for Marketing & PR, including sentiment analysis and reach evaluation

campaign_performance_analysis.involvedTeams: Marketing, AI Team, specialist departments such as Sales, HR, etc. as clients (defining KPIs for measurable performance)
campaign_performance_analysis.potentialConflicts: Dependency on data from various platforms, data protection for customer data
campaign_performance_analysis.requiredResources: Personnel (Data Scientist, Marketing Analyst), budget for AI tools, cloud infrastructure
campaign_performance_analysis.dataAvailability: Campaign data from CRM, social media, Google Ads, internal marketing data
campaign_performance_analysis.genaiConsiderations:
Prototype milestones: AI model for real-time analysis
Pilot design: Dashboard with trend alerts
Ethics & data protection: GDPR-compliant processing, anonymization
Scalability: Integration into marketing automation systems
Change management: Training for Marketing teams + specialist departments
campaign_performance_analysis.additionalComments: Goal: Real-time optimization of campaigns, ROI increase, data-driven decisions

ideas.internal_freight_exchange: Internal Freight Exchange with AI Disposition

problems.ai_assisted_workflow: [General] – Missing ChatGPT interface for team members
problems.automatic_gate_detection: [Warehouse] – Missing transparency about hall gate occupancy
problems.computer_vision_load_detection: [Warehouse] – No overview of truck fill levels
problems.predictive_disposition_pricing: [Disposition] – Missing forecasts for demand and costs
problems.internal_freight_exchange: [Disposition] – Decentralized route planning in individual companies

solutions.ai_assisted_workflow: Introduction of a usable ChatGPT GUI to accelerate general tasks
solutions.data_quality_analysis: Error analysis master data (detection of false entries)
solutions.computer_vision_pallet_tracking: CV: Automated pallet tracking in the warehouse so that no adhesive labels are needed anymore. Today pallets remain standing that no one has "on their radar" anymore. This can also prevent incorrect loading if necessary
solutions.automatic_gate_detection: CV: License plate recognition at the hall gate to automatically detect gate occupancy
solutions.computer_vision_load_detection: CV: Load detection in the truck. Fill level, loading sequence, load securing
solutions.predictive_disposition_pricing: Disposition: Learning from historical data. What happens cyclically? Plant holidays, vacation times, Christmas, Easter. Truck procurement possibly more difficult at certain times, oversupply of trucks at other times. Important for price negotiations and planning. Knowledge previously only in the heads of dispatchers, if a dispatcher leaves the company the knowledge is gone.
solutions.intelligent_kpi_chatbot: I ask the bot what the key figure for an area is
solutions.internal_freight_exchange: Something like an internal freight exchange with a recommendation on which truck the shipment could best be dispatched
solutions.scenario_based_financial_forecasts: About a suggestion of values for the future that forecasts data for the future based on different scenarios
solutions.telematics_cost_forecast: One could use telematics data for condition forecasting and cost prediction

complexity.data_quality_analysis: Apart from rule-based algorithms, there are many possible problems related to master data. Does the address really exist? Is it perhaps completely new and not yet contained in any map? Spelling of data can cause problems when different languages come into play, not just for addresses.
complexity.computer_vision_pallet_tracking: A hall gate doesn't just serve one truck parking space but often two. You have to recognize which forklift is now unloading which truck. Furthermore, you have to know what is on the truck and the system must have an "idea" of what what is on the truck should probably look like. This can be remedied for a first version with manual assistance, but the problem of camera lighting in the hall remains problematic. What if a pallet is placed in a blind spot? What if goods are placed outside the hall?
complexity.automatic_gate_detection: License plate recognition already works today, e.g. in parking garages. Problems can arise when several license plate-like signs are attached to a truck trailer. Here the right one must be found for comparison with the system data.
complexity.computer_vision_load_detection: Since several pallets stand one behind the other on the truck, not all are visible through just one camera even with side loading. Additionally, the depth relative to the trailer would have to be recognized. This may require several cameras.
complexity.predictive_disposition_pricing: The data available today must be laboriously cleaned before analysis can take place, as it is currently hardly usable. Furthermore, it must be modeled very precisely what one actually wants to know. A pure LLM-based approach will probably not work here.
complexity.intelligent_kpi_chatbot: Key figures are indeed sometimes measured differently, building a central data pool of key figures is already in progress, but no data can currently be trained on it. Reports are partly fragmented, branch-specific, different reporting systems
complexity.internal_freight_exchange: Single file in Caro not available. Orders are copied internally instead of being dispatched as one order across multiple companies. Acceptance among dispatchers could be difficult. Everyone does their own thing. Master data is not maintained consistently, many duplicates in addresses. Geocoding would have to be checked.
complexity.scenario_based_financial_forecasts: What influencing factors are there? Internal ones can possibly be determined, external ones difficult to predict. Cost and revenue forecasting should however already be possible with sales and CRM. Not all areas are planned driver-based and database-supported.
complexity.predictive_hr_analytics: There is no central HR database yet that is kept consistent. However, data from companies is standardized in one database. Influencing factors (feature engineering) could become difficult if not all attributes are maintained
complexity.telematics_cost_forecast: Fleet telematics data such as tire pressures, usage severity, driver rating and repair data are already recorded. However, it could be difficult to assign individual invoice items to categories like tires, engine, etc. The data quality could be rather poor overall if SAP incoming invoices are not booked correctly

cost.data_quality_analysis: Many people have to work on the topics. Additionally, many rules must be defined for how to handle which data. The costs arise here mainly on a personnel level
cost.computer_vision_pallet_tracking: A lot of hardware effort, cameras, computers with appropriate hardware to evaluate many images in a short time. Personnel effort in development
cost.automatic_gate_detection: Hardware with camera quite cheap to make, only the hardware for evaluation could be somewhat more expensive. Software not very problematic due to already available libraries. (OpenCV, Pytesseract)
cost.telematics_cost_forecast: Rather higher costs due to the amount of data. If the agent is added then it will probably check the data several times a day

risk.predictive_disposition_pricing: If the assessment is wrong, additional costs are produced through incorrectly purchased fleet

problems.ticket_quality_prioritization: Many unsorted and poorly configured tickets in the service portal / Allocation and prioritization of tickets
problems.meeting_minutes: Auto logging of meetings and sending them to all participants
problems.c_level_communication: Communication towards C-Level: Easy-to-understand presentations of complex issues for decision-making
problems.colleague_communication: Communication towards colleagues: Easy-to-understand presentations so that employees can understand security requirements and regulations
problems.self_service_it_assistant: Employees often wait long for simple IT assistance (e.g., password reset, VPN access).
problems.roadmap_creation: Generating a roadmap from various projects
problems.project_tracking: Automated tracking of project progress at Duvenbeck
problems.automated_ticket_classification: Support tickets must be manually categorized, which extends processing time.

solutions.ticket_quality_prioritization: Quality improvement through agent that asks follow-up questions. Evaluation of tickets regarding urgency and automatic assignment to appropriate teams / IT chatbot offers solutions
solutions.meeting_minutes: Automatic transcription during a meeting and summary
solutions.c_level_communication: Automated creation of presentations based on web research and/or internal data
solutions.colleague_communication: Automated creation of presentations based on web research and/or internal data
solutions.self_service_it_assistant: Provision of an interactive IT chatbot in the Digital Workplace that directly solves or forwards standard requests.
solutions.project_tracking: Regular automated queries to workstream leads
solutions.automated_ticket_classification: Introduction of an AI module in the ticket system that automatically classifies, prioritizes and assigns requests to the right team.

complexity.ticket_quality_prioritization: Existing ticket system only needs to be re-sorted through categorizations, whereby tickets are directly assigned
complexity.self_service_it_assistant: Agent must access documentation. Access to general information. Web form in service portal
complexity.roadmap_creation: AI must extract data from tools. Primarily Planview
complexity.project_tracking: AI must extract data from tools. Primarily Planview

cost.ticket_quality_prioritization: Ticket system is available. Costs arise through input to AI and calculation. Internal programming effort
cost.meeting_minutes: Only low costs, as selected employees are enabled (approx. 30€)
cost.c_level_communication: Only low costs, as selected employees are enabled (approx. 30€)
cost.colleague_communication: Only low costs, as selected employees are enabled (approx. 30€)
cost.self_service_it_assistant: Probably few transactions. Possibly internal effort for providing information and software developers
cost.roadmap_creation: Probably few transactions. Number of workstream leads manageable. Possibly effort from software manufacturer Planview for interface
cost.project_tracking: Probably few transactions. Number of workstream leads manageable. Possibly effort from software manufacturer Planview for interface

roi.ticket_quality_prioritization: Time savings, allowing employees to focus on essential work
roi.meeting_minutes: Great time savings and improved documentation, follow-up, task tracking, etc.
roi.c_level_communication: Time savings for a "small" user group
roi.colleague_communication: Time savings for a "small" user group
roi.self_service_it_assistant: Reduction of service desk requests. Quick help for operations making requests.
roi.roadmap_creation: Time savings for a "small" user group
roi.project_tracking: Time savings for a "small" user group

risk.ticket_quality_prioritization: Tickets could be assigned incorrectly. Processing could be wrong. Tickets must be double-checked
risk.c_level_communication: Risk in research, results must be validated
risk.colleague_communication: Risk in research, results must be validated
risk.self_service_it_assistant: If solution is not helpful, the request is returned to the helpdesk

strategic.roadmap_creation: Quality improvement / Prioritization and presentation of progress / Portfolio management
strategic.project_tracking: Quality improvement / Prioritization and resource planning

problems.automated_route_optimization: Route planning is partially manual and doesn't always consider real-time data like traffic or driving times.
problems.unified_road_reporting: KPI reports (e.g., utilization, empty runs, punctuality) are inconsistent and difficult to compare.
problems.meeting_agent: Summary of meetings and structuring of pending tasks
problems.edi_mapping: Effort to transform customer EDI information into other formats that our WMS can process (customer, Lobster)
problems.edi_testing: Much time to create many test messages for different business cases

solutions.automated_route_optimization: Introduction of an AI-supported tool for dynamic route planning that considers traffic, tolls, driving times and order priority.
solutions.unified_road_reporting: Development of a central road dashboard with standardized metrics and automatic data collection.
solutions.meeting_agent: Automatic summarization and documentation of tasks for respective teams (Microsoft Copilot/Facilitator)
solutions.edi_mapping: AI suggestions for mapping, so that humans become controllers and AI checks, but mapping no longer has to be done manually
solutions.edi_testing: Creation of test messages to defined business cases to have quality start-ups of projects

modal.metricsDescription: Detailed evaluation of project feasibility and impact
modal.migrationNeeded: Project details are not available for this department yet. Please check back after the data migration is complete.
modal.ideaNotFoundDesc: The selected idea could not be found in the department's data.

descriptions.dataAvailability: Which data is available or must be provided
descriptions.genaiConsiderations: Prototype milestones: Focus on controlled experiments to validate feasibility. Pilot design: User-centered tests and iterations based on feedback. Ethics and data protection: Early protective measures (e.g., anonymized data, fairness audits). Scalability: Assessment of infrastructure for larger implementations. Change management: Planning for training and user acceptance.
descriptions.timeline: By when should which milestone be achieved?
descriptions.additionalComments: What else is important for this initiative?

ideas.automatic_customer_calculation: Automatic Calculation + Processing of Customer Requests
ideas.automatic_co2_tracking: Automatic Collection of All Necessary Data + CO2 Emissions Calculation

problems.ai_data_collection: Creating necessary KPIs and building the data foundation
problems.ai_data_processing: Time-consuming creation of monthly ESG Master KPIs
problems.automatic_customer_calculation: Customer requests for CO2 balancing at transport level, etc.
problems.automatic_co2_tracking: Annual creation of Corporate Carbon Footprint (GES CO2) - Scope 3

solutions.ai_text_creation: Automated creation of respective ESRS text modules
solutions.ai_data_collection: Support/automation of data collection + data quality
solutions.ai_data_processing: Automated creation of Master KPIs through data foundation
solutions.automatic_customer_calculation: Collection of freight letters or other parameters for calculating CO2 per transport, shipment, etc. (Shipzero tool)
solutions.automatic_co2_tracking: Tracking, calculation, etc. of Scope 3 emissions (mostly very unclear) for e.g., employee commuting, waste, etc.

complexity.ai_text_creation: Creation of text modules for reporting
complexity.ai_data_collection: Automation of a variety of data
complexity.automatic_co2_tracking: Many unknown parameters must be collected; if not possible, standardized extrapolation must be performed

risk.ai_text_creation: Flat rate, as fixed reporting framework does not yet exist
risk.ai_data_collection: Flat rate, as fixed reporting framework does not yet exist
risk.automatic_customer_calculation: Missing or incorrect values could affect customer relationships
risk.automatic_co2_tracking: Missing or incorrectly calculated values can influence CO2 balancing

roi.ai_text_creation: Among other things, the report is expected to become part of the annual reporting in 2027 + customer requirement
roi.ai_data_collection: Among other things, the report is expected to become part of the annual reporting in 2027 + customer requirement
roi.automatic_customer_calculation: Among other things, important for new customer business
roi.automatic_co2_tracking: Among other things, important for new customer business

strategic.automatic_customer_calculation: Certification necessary, also strategically important for a variety of stakeholders
strategic.automatic_co2_tracking: Contributes to the above legal requirements

automatic_customer_calculation.potentialConflicts: Possible with IT; e.g., integration of tool via interface (IT integration team already serves other internal interests)
automatic_customer_calculation.requiredResources: Project team: approx. 4 employees, budget incl. staff + technology during project period ~ €150,000 (?)
automatic_customer_calculation.dataAvailability: Parameters available in freight letters, provision of conversion factors + certified calculation methodology necessary
automatic_customer_calculation.genaiConsiderations: User-centered test phases with feedback loops
automatic_customer_calculation.timeline:
Module for calculating transport emissions should be completed by the end of 2025, 
Milestone 1: Data provision by DUV by 11/2025
Milestone 2: Data integration into existing technology by mid-12/2025
Milestone 3: Test phase of initial data runs + subsequent optimization by the end of 12/2025

problems.hr_data_dashboard: Data (master data & KPIs) must be retrieved from various systems and centrally consolidated and delivered to various stakeholders and shareholders.
problems.employee_information_dashboard: Gather information about an employee as a decision basis for any personnel measures. All necessary information for next steps must be retrieved from different systems (payroll system, personnel file, time information system, transfer matrix, etc.).
problems.hr_agent: Employees often don't have quick answers to HR questions.
problems.vacation_management: Vacation: Employee vacation requests regarding remaining vacation balance, all vacation requests via D3 (in GER) are manually entered into the time information program, vacation requests from D3 need to be incorporated into the work schedule
problems.email_prioritization: Prioritization of emails in Outlook, automatic reminders for unprocessed emails

solutions.hr_data_dashboard: AI workflow for querying master data and defined KPIs and merging/consolidating as well as providing as reports and live dashboard
solutions.employee_information_dashboard: Compilation of all important employee information in one overview
solutions.hr_agent: An HR agent provides immediate information on HR topics.
solutions.vacation_management: Determination of current vacation balances, automated transmission to employees. Digital vacation requests must be automatically considered in the work schedule. The system captures approved vacation requests from D3 into the time recording program
solutions.email_prioritization: Email evaluation, response suggestions in connection with Duvenbeck-specific knowledge, email reminders, prioritization

complexity.hr_data_dashboard: very complicated due to different specificities of country, business unit, locations, systems and payroll providers, plus complexity in data harmonization, probably not all data is currently available in the systems or in different places
complexity.employee_information_dashboard: very complicated due to different specificities of country, business unit, locations, systems and payroll providers, probably not all data is currently available in the systems or in different places
complexity.hr_agent: country-specific containers must be filled, possibly automatically filled, legal reliability, differences within a country (locations, collective bargaining), filling legal HR topics possible provider Haufe (for Germany)
complexity.vacation_management: very complicated due to different specificities of country, business unit, locations, systems and payroll providers, plus complexity in data harmonization, probably not all data is currently available in the systems or in different places
complexity.email_prioritization: Complexity lies in training Duvenbeck-specific knowledge

cost.hr_data_dashboard: High costs when setting up the systems, later regarding running costs no high costs expected
cost.employee_information_dashboard: High costs when setting up the systems, later regarding running costs no high costs expected
cost.hr_agent: annual license costs for different country-specific providers, consider different language packages (countries but also driver personnel within a country)
cost.vacation_management: High costs when setting up the systems, later regarding running costs no high costs expected
cost.email_prioritization: Costs for local hosting, one-time costs for building the workflow, possibly server costs

risk.hr_agent: rather low risk, as HR controls the content
risk.email_prioritization: Prerequisite: local hosting, in this case personal data is protected

roi.hr_data_dashboard: An HR dashboard at the respective organizational level leads to a significantly better decision-making basis for operational HR management --> greatly improved reporting, shareholder and stakeholder satisfaction, this represents a management tool that is not yet available to us today, this also leads to risk minimization, early warning systems, personnel deployment planning
roi.employee_information_dashboard: An HR dashboard at the respective organizational level leads to a significantly better decision-making basis for operational HR management --> greatly improved reporting, shareholder and stakeholder satisfaction, this represents a management tool that is not yet available to us today, this also leads to risk minimization, early warning systems, personnel deployment planning --> forms the basis for a consolidated HR dashboard / master data management
roi.hr_agent: ROI highly dependent on the size of the country (number of employees), proportion of blue collar (rather high ROI) and white collar area, location with high turnover --> high ROI)
roi.vacation_management: Management of vacation provisions, flows into management of temporary work, if vacation phases are compensated by temporary work (mainly affects blue collar in PCL)

strategic.hr_agent: Productivity increase, should refer to a digitalization strategy
strategic.vacation_management: Productivity increase, should refer to a digitalization strategy

hr_data_dashboard.involvedTeams: central HR management, contact persons for payroll providers in the countries (on Duvenbeck side and on the payroll provider side), IT, Corporate Development, Finance regarding reporting
hr_data_dashboard.potentialConflicts: Data harmonization / term definitions (e.g., FTE; Absence Status, etc.)
hr_data_dashboard.dataAvailability: Basic data warehouse exists, currently expanding data queries, data scope table can then be made available
hr_data_dashboard.genaiConsiderations: local hosting necessary, role concept / access rights / reporting regarding the HR dashboard
hr_data_dashboard.timeline: Q1 2026 for the first pilot, rollout during Q4 2026

employee_information_dashboard.involvedTeams: central HR management, contact persons for payroll providers in the countries (on Duvenbeck side and on the payroll provider side), IT, Corporate Development, Finance regarding reporting
employee_information_dashboard.potentialConflicts: Data harmonization / term definitions (e.g., FTE; Absence Status, etc.)
employee_information_dashboard.dataAvailability: Basic data warehouse exists, currently expanding data queries, data scope table can then be made available
employee_information_dashboard.genaiConsiderations: local hosting necessary, role concept / access rights / reporting regarding the HR dashboard
employee_information_dashboard.timeline: Q2 2026 for the first pilot, rollout during Q4 2026
employee_information_dashboard.additionalComments: Dependent on the introduction of SAP Success Factors (SF can provide such an employee master data sheet)

hr_agent.involvedTeams: Legal, IT, Regional HR managers, suppliers for legal content
hr_agent.dataAvailability:
Prior decision on scope of HR chatbot (which questions should be covered) 
Suppliers provide legal data, regional HR managers must provide Duvenbeck-specific data
hr_agent.genaiConsiderations:
local hosting necessary, 
country-specific containers or each country/region/location has specific chatbot content,
decision on foreign languages to be used,
decision on text, voice or video - chatbot
hr_agent.additionalComments: Scalability to an onboarding chatbot and topics outside of HR (e.g., breakdown assistance for drivers)

priorityAnalysis.title: Priority Calculator
priorityAnalysis.subtitle: Interactive priority calculator based on the official Duvenbeck scoring matrix. Adjust weighting criteria to perform sensitivity analysis and identify the most strategic AI initiatives across all departments.
priorityAnalysis.instructions: Adjust the weighting sliders above to reflect your strategic priorities. The ranking will update automatically to show which initiatives align best with your chosen criteria. Use the scenario buttons for common prioritization approaches.

calculator.title: Interactive Priority Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Adjust weighting criteria to see how AI initiative priorities change in real-time. Based on the official Duvenbeck scoring matrix.

rankings.title: Priority Rankings
rankings.subtitle: Ideas ranked by current weighting configuration

tooltips.rank: Position in the priority ranking based on the weighted scoring algorithm
tooltips.aiInitiative: Name and description of the proposed AI initiative identified during the workshop
tooltips.department: The business unit or department that originated this AI initiative proposal
tooltips.score: Calculated priority score (0-100) based on the weighted combination of all scoring criteria
tooltips.category: Priority category automatically assigned based on the calculated score (Top: 80+, High: 65+, Medium: 45+, Low: <45)

breakdown.title: Detailed Scoring Breakdown
breakdown.subtitle: Individual criterion scores and weighted contributions

scenarioComparison.title: Scenario Comparison
scenarioComparison.subtitle: Compare top 5 initiatives across different weighting scenarios

insights.title: Interactive Insights Visualization
insights.subtitle: Explore initiative relationships through dynamic bubble charts with multiple grouping options
insights.bubbleSize: Bubble size represents the overall priority score
insights.clickBubble: Click any bubble to view detailed initiative information
insights.groupingHelps: Different groupings reveal patterns and relationships between initiatives

modal.workshopDescription: This initiative was identified during Duvenbeck's AI Workshop sessions (October 6-8, 2025) where department heads and key stakeholders collaborated to identify AI opportunities across the organization. The scoring reflects collective assessment by domain experts and strategic leadership.
modal.aiPoweredSolution: AI-powered {name} utilizing machine learning algorithms to automate and optimize the identified processes.

complexityLevels.low: Low complexity - can leverage existing tools and infrastructure with minimal custom development.
complexityLevels.moderate: Moderate complexity - requires some custom development but uses standard AI/ML approaches.
complexityLevels.high: High complexity - requires significant custom development, integration challenges, or novel AI approaches.
complexityLevels.veryHigh: Very high complexity - cutting-edge AI research required, significant technical risks and integration challenges.

costLevels.low: Low cost (< €50k) - primarily configuration and training costs.
costLevels.moderate: Moderate cost (€50k-200k) - includes software licenses, development, and implementation.
costLevels.high: High cost (€200k-500k) - significant development, infrastructure, and change management costs.
costLevels.veryHigh: Very high cost (> €500k) - major enterprise-scale implementation with extensive customization.

roiLevels.exceptional: Exceptional ROI (€100k+ annually) - major process improvements, significant cost savings, or new revenue streams.
roiLevels.high: High ROI (€50k-100k annually) - measurable efficiency gains and cost reductions.
roiLevels.moderate: Moderate ROI (€25k-50k annually) - process improvements with quantifiable benefits.
roiLevels.low: Low ROI (€10k-25k annually) - limited quantifiable benefits, mostly qualitative improvements.
roiLevels.minimal: Minimal ROI (< €10k annually) - primarily strategic or compliance-driven initiative.

riskLevels.low: Low risk - proven technology, clear implementation path, minimal business disruption.
riskLevels.moderate: Moderate risk - standard implementation risks, manageable with proper planning.
riskLevels.high: High risk - technical uncertainties, potential business disruption, or regulatory concerns.
riskLevels.veryHigh: Very high risk - unproven technology, significant business impact, or major compliance implications.

strategicLevels.high: High alignment - directly supports key strategic objectives and digital transformation goals.
strategicLevels.moderate: Moderate alignment - supports departmental goals and overall business strategy.
strategicLevels.low: Low alignment - peripheral to main strategic objectives, primarily operational benefits.
strategicLevels.poor: Poor alignment - limited connection to strategic goals, primarily tactical initiative.

warehouse_automation.name: Warehouse Process Automation
warehouse_automation.description: AI-powered warehouse management with automated sorting and inventory tracking

compliance_damage_claim_automation.name: Damage Claim Processing Automation
compliance_damage_claim_automation.description: Automated damage claim review and assessment using AI image recognition and natural language processing

fleet_predictive_maintenance.name: Predictive Fleet Maintenance
fleet_predictive_maintenance.description: IoT and AI system to predict vehicle maintenance needs and prevent breakdowns

finance_invoice_processing.name: Intelligent Invoice Processing
finance_invoice_processing.description: Automated invoice processing and accounts payable management using OCR and ML

route_optimization.name: Dynamic Route Optimization
route_optimization.description: Real-time route optimization using traffic data, weather conditions, and delivery constraints

customer_service_chatbot.name: Customer Service Automation
customer_service_chatbot.description: AI-powered customer service chatbot for handling inquiries and support requests
